task.title: How to Add People in a Server
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to add people to your server.

prereq.p: To be able to add people to your server, first you must have your own server.

context.p: When you add people to your server you make communication between you guys easier.

step.cmd: Click on the server name in the top left of the application.
Copy the auto-generated link you are given and send it to your friends.
